TEXT.TITLE: ASARCO UPS U.S. LEAD PRICE 0.50 CT TO 26.50 CTS
TEXT.BODY: Asarco Inc said it is increasing its base spot sales price for refined lead by one-half cent to 26.50 cents a lb, FOB, delivered in carload lots, effective immediately. Reuter
